trans-unit.source: Example

seg-source.mrk: Example

target.mrk: Example

trans-unit.source: Have you ever dreamed of stepping on each of the six continents around the planet during a single, amazing trip? Our Around the World in 80 Days travel package is specifically designed for this.

seg-source.mrk: Have you ever dreamed of stepping on each of the six continents around the planet during a single, amazing trip?
Our Around the World in 80 Days travel package is specifically designed for this.

target.mrk: Have you ever dreamed of stepping on each of the six continents around the planet during a single, amazing trip?
Our Around the World in 80 Days travel package is specifically designed for this.

trans-unit.source: From the canyons of Arizona, to the Khmer temples deep in the jungle; from the tropical beaches of Queensland to the glaciers of Antarctica; or from the wild savanna of Africa to mysterious castles in the forests of Bohemia, our offer takes you in some of the most amazing places on our planet. In 80 days, you will see more of the world than most see through their entire lifetime! You will come back with the rich experience that nothing but a true journey can provide.

seg-source.mrk: From the canyons of Arizona, to the Khmer temples deep in the jungle; from the tropical beaches of Queensland to the glaciers of Antarctica; or from the wild savanna of Africa to mysterious castles in the forests of Bohemia, our offer takes you in some of the most amazing places on our planet.
In 80 days, you will see more of the world than most see through their entire lifetime!
You will come back with the rich experience that nothing but a true journey can provide.

target.mrk: From the canyons of Arizona, to the Khmer temples deep in the jungle; from the tropical beaches of Queensland to the glaciers of Antarctica; or from the wild savanna of Africa to mysterious castles in the forests of Bohemia, our offer takes you in some of the most amazing places on our planet.
In 80 days, you will see more of the world than most see through their entire lifetime!
You will come back with the rich experience that nothing but a true journey can provide.
